name: Steve Pierce
text:
I’ve used this company on a few repairs (the most recent was one I created) and every exchange has been professional, quick, and priced fairly. I’ve dealt with Rick each time and he’s a great guy to work with.
Five stars for me-

Steve Pierce
Coast Equipment Services

name: Dwight Keener
text: Great price on a fuel injector pump rebuild. Saved me from buying a new one. Great job.

name: Victoria Edwards
text: BEWARE!!!!!! Do not buy a turbo from this place!!! We bought a turbo for $1600 dollars and 3 weeks later it went out and now they don't want to cover it with the warranty. This is the worst service I have ever received and a WASTE of money. I got children to feed.

name: Capt Tom Adams
text: Test CalibrationGreat place for turbos and injector pump rebuilds!!! Nice folks too ! Tom Adams Mexico Beach Charters

name: Jackie Neese
text: I have been dealing with this company for a year and they refuse to stand by their parts- if you can get coverage for the part your lucky but you will never see a dime for labor compensation. DO NOT use them ever!!! Deal with someone who will stand beside their parts and back them with labor coverage. They are horrible to deal with!!!!!
